# AI-Powered Log Debugging Assistant

## Project Overview
A Python-based intelligent log analysis tool that uses AI to detect patterns, anomalies, and root causes in application logs. Perfect for backend engineers to quickly diagnose system issues.

## Progress Tracking

- [x] Step 1: Create .github directory & instructions

## Development Guidelines

### Project Structure
```
.
├── .github/
├── src/
│   ├── __init__.py
│   ├── log_parser.py
│   ├── analyzer.py
│   ├── ai_engine.py
│   ├── anomaly_detector.py
│   └── reporter.py
├── tests/
├── config/
├── logs/ (sample logs)
├── requirements.txt
├── setup.py
└── README.md
```

### Core Features
- Log parsing and normalization
- Pattern detection and clustering
- Anomaly detection using statistical methods
- AI-powered root cause analysis
- Comprehensive reporting

### Development Workflow
Use `.` as working directory for all commands.
